RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the camper compartment: camper compartment of Maria De Jesus Garcia's vehicle
RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the jury: jury in Maria De Jesus Garcia's trial

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.5th Circuit Court of Appeals: US Court of Appeals circuit reviewing the case regarding roving border patrols and the Brignoni-Ponce standard, providing instructions to jurors on their duties and responsibilities
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Maria De Jesus Garcia's vehicle: vehicle searched for undocumented aliens, subject of a court case, and used by Maria De Jesus Garcia during the incident
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.camper compartment of Maria De Jesus Gar: part of the vehicle where occupants were suspected to be hiding, subject of a search by border patrol agents, and relevant to the suppression motion in Maria De Jesus Garcia's trial
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.jury in Maria De Jesus Garcia's trial: jury that received a modified Allen charge during deliberations and was involved in Maria De Jesus Garcia's case
